thread.title: Doctors held hostage by gun-wielding patient in Istanbul | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Doctors held hostage by gun-wielding patient in Istanbul | Daily Mail Online

author: Julian Robinson For Mailonline
title: Doctors held hostage by gun-wielding patient in Istanbul | Daily Mail Online
text: comments An armed man is holding a number of doctors and other staff hostage at a hospital in Istanbul, it has emerged. The gunman is believed to be a patient at the psychiatric unit of Istanbul's Cerrahpasa hospital, according to local reports. Police have been dispatched to the scene. More follows.
